Arc Lightning.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Increase the Chain range of Shock Pulse by {scale=8|8}%.

Astral Traveler.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Increase your Movement Speed while using Ghost Walk by {scale=25|25}%.

Conduit.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=6|6}% for 3s after hitting an enemy with Shock Pulse.

Crackle.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the duration of Healing Totem by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Electrostatic.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Ammo regeneration speed by {scale=12|12}%.

Gale.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Decrease the Cooldown of Healing Totem by {scale=1|1}s after activating Ghost Walk.

Haunting.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Reduce the Cooldown of Ghost Walk by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Healing Rain.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Allies inside your Healing Totem are Healed for {scale=1|1}% of their maximum Health every 1s.

Lightning Rod.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Heal for {scale=30|30} for each enemy hit with Shock Pulse.

Maelstrom.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Your weapon shots reduce the Cooldown of Shock Pulse by 0.5s and Shock Pulse chains 4 additional times.

Monolith Totem.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the Health of Healing Totem by {scale=250|250}.

Outreach.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the radius of Healing Totem by {scale=25|25}%.

Phantom.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Increase the duration of Ghost Walk by {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Spirit's Domain.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting allies with your Lightning Staff Heals them for 900 per second.

Thunderstruck.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] Generate {scale=6|6}% of your Ammo for each unique enemy hit by Shock Pulse.

Totemic Rescue.card_desc: [Armor] Gain a {scale=200|200}-Health Shield for 4s after dropping to or below 30% Health.

Totemic Ward.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the Healing done by Healing Totem by 30% and allies Healed by Healing Totem gain Immunity to Crowd Control for 2s.

Astralreisender.card_desc: [Geistergang] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Geistergang um {scale=25|25}%.

Blitzableiter.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Für jeden mit Schockimpuls getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=30|30} LP geheilt.

Blitzeinschlag.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Pro mit Schockimpuls getroffenem Gegner wird {scale=6|6}% Munition erzeugt.

Bogenblitz.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Erhöht die Sprungreichweite von Schockimpuls um {scale=8|8}%.

Geisterreich.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Triffst du Verbündete mit dem Blitzstab, werden sie 900 LP pro Sekunden geheilt.

Heilregen.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Verbündete innerhalb deines Heiltotems werden pro Sekunde um {scale=1|1}% ihrer maximalen Gesundheit geheilt.

Knistern.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Erhöht die Dauer von Heiltotem um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Mahlstrom.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Deine Waffenschüsse reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Schockimpuls um 0,5s und Schockimpuls springt noch 4-mal hin und her.

Phantom.card_desc: [Geistergang] Erhöht die Dauer von Geistergang um {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Reichweite.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Erhöht den Radius von Heiltotem um {scale=25|25}%.

Schamanische Macht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=100|100} LP.

Schocktherapie.card_desc: [Schockimpuls] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Schockimpuls, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=6|6}%.

Sch\u00fctzendes Totem.card_desc: [Heiltotem] Von Heiltotem geheilte Verbündete sind 2s lang immun gegen CC-Effekte. Die Heilung von Heiltotem erhöht sich um 30%.

Spuken.card_desc: [Geistergang] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Geistergang um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Sturmwind.card_desc: [Geistergang] Nach Aktivierung von Geistergang wird die Abklingzeit von Heiltotem um {scale=1|1}s reduziert.

Totemrettung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 30% Gesundheit, erhältst du 4s lang einen Schild mit {scale=200|200} LP.

Arc \u00e9lectrique.card_desc: [Choc électrique] La portée de rebond de Choc électrique augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Bourrasque.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale réduit le temps de recharge du Totem de soin de {scale=1|1}s.

Conduit.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Toucher un ennemi avec Choc électrique augmente votre vitesse de {scale=6|6}% pendant 3s.

Cr\u00e9pitement.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

Domaine spirituel.card_desc: [Arme] Le Bâton de foudre rend 900 PV par seconde aux alliés.

\u00c9lectrostatique.card_desc: [Arme] La vitesse à laquelle vous regagnez vos munitions augmente de {scale=12|12}%.

Fantomatique.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Fant\u00f4me.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale dure {scale=0.3|0.3}s de plus.

Foudroy\u00e9.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Choc électrique vous redonne {scale=6|6}% de vos munitions par ennemi différent touché.

Maelstr\u00f6m.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Vos tirs d'arme réduisent de 0,5s le temps de recharge de Choc électrique, qui rebondit 4 fois de plus.

Paratonnerre.card_desc: [Choc électrique] Chaque champion atteint par Choc électrique vous redonne {scale=30|30} PV.

Pluie de soin.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin rend aussi {scale=1|1}% des PV max. par seconde aux alliés.

Protection tot\u00e9mique.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Totem de soin rend 30% de PV de plus et rend les alliés immunisés aux contrôles pendant 2s.

Rayonnement.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Le rayon du Totem de soin augmente de {scale=25|25}%.

Secours tot\u00e9mique.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de 30% de PV donne un bouclier de {scale=200|200} PV pendant 4s.

Totem monolithique.card_desc: [Totem de soin] Le Totem de soin a {scale=250|250} PV de plus.

Voyageur astral.card_desc: [Marche spectrale] Marche spectrale augmente votre vitesse de {scale=25|25}%.

\u51c0\u5316\u4e4b\u98ce.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 灵魂行走激活时减少你治疗图腾的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u53e4\u65e7\u56fe\u817e.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 增加治疗图腾的持续时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u56fe\u817e\u6025\u6551.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于30%时，你将获得一个{scale=200|200}生命值的护盾，持续4秒

\u56fe\u817e\u7ed3\u754c.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 被治疗图腾治疗的友军会获得2秒的免疫控制效果，且治疗图腾的治疗效果提高40%

\u5e7b\u5f71.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 增加灵魂行走的持续时间{scale=0.3|0.3}秒

\u5f27\u5f62\u95ea\u7535.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击的弹射范围增加{scale=12|12}%

\u6069\u6cfd\u4f17\u751f.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾的作用半径增加{scale=10|10}%

\u661f\u754c\u65c5\u8005.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 技能激活时获得{scale=25|25}%额外的移动速度

\u6cbb\u7597\u4e4b\u96e8.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 在图腾范围内的友军每秒回复最大生命值的{scale=1|1}%

\u7075\u57df.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾可以在一定距离施放，且范围内满血队友获得的治疗量会转化为护盾。

\u7535\u80fd\u4f20\u5bfc.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击命中一个敌方英雄, 会使你获得{scale=6|6}%的移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u78d0\u77f3\u56fe\u817e.card_desc: [治疗图腾] 治疗图腾的生命值增加{scale=250|250}点

\u8428\u6ee1\u610f\u5fd7.card_desc: [护甲] 增加你的基础生命值上限{scale=100|100}

\u95ea\u7535\u4e4b\u6756.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击命中敌方英雄都会使你获得{scale=30|30}点治疗

\u95ea\u7535\u6f29\u6da1.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 每当普通攻击造成伤害时，震荡冲击的冷却时间降低0.3秒。闪电冲击的弹跳次数提高4次

\u96f7\u51fb.card_desc: [震荡冲击] 震荡冲击每命中一个不同的敌人，回复{scale=6|6}%武器能量

\u9759\u7535\u611f\u5e94.card_desc: [武器] 武器能量回复速度提高{scale=12|12}%

\u9b3c\u5f71\u68ee\u68ee.card_desc: [灵魂行走] 减少灵魂行走的冷却时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

Arc Lightning.card_desc: [Chain Lightning] You may target your Healing Totem with Chain lightning and also increase the bounce range by 10%.

Astral Traveler.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Gain 25% additional Movement Speed during Ghost Walk.

Conduit.card_desc: [Shock Pulse] For every 400 damage enemies take during Shock Pulse spawn an HP drop that heals for 100.

Crackle.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Those affected take 4 less damage per hit.

Electrostatic.card_desc: [Totemic Ward] Totemic Ward releases a pulse every {4}s that reveals Stealthed enemies within 40 units.

Gale.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Targets affected by Healing Totem reduce Crowd Control by 25%

Hamstring.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Weapon attacks slow enemies by 10% for 2s.

Healing Rain.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Your Healing totem Heals for an additional +1.5% of the recipient's maximum Health per second.

Lightning Rod.card_desc: [Chain Lightning] Your weapon hits turn enemies into a lightning rod. Chain Lightning bounced off these targets deals {25}% more damage

Monolith Totem.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase your Healing Totem Health by 500 and reduce the damage it takes by 5%.

Outreach.card_desc: [Healing Totem] Increase the radius of Healing Totem by 20%.

Phantom.card_desc: [Ghost Walk] Increase the duration of Ghost Walk by 1s and reduce the Cooldown by 5s.

Shamanic Might.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by 75.

Thunderlord.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon can fire {5}% longer before overheating.

Thunderstruck.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting a stealth target with your weapon reveals it for 1s.

Totemic Rescue.card_desc: [Armor] When your Health is reduced below 30%, you place a Healing Totem at your feet and gain 40% Movement Speed for 4s

Conducto.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=6|6}% durante 3s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Pulso de choque.

Crujido.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] La duración de Tótem curativo aumenta en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Custodia tot\u00e9mica.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] La curación de Tótem curativo aumenta un 30% y los aliados curados por la habilidad reciben inmunidad al CM durante 2s.

Dominio del Esp\u00edritu.card_desc: [Arma] Si alcanzas a aliados con Bastón luminoso, les curarás 900 PS por segundo.

Electrost\u00e1tica.card_desc: [Arma] Tu regeneración de munición aumenta un {scale=12|12}%.

Estupefacci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Recuperas un {scale=6|6}% de tu munición por cada enemigo único que alcances con Pulso de choque.

Et\u00e9reo.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] La recarga de Paso fantasma se reduce en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Extensi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] El radio de efecto de Tótem curativo aumenta un {scale=25|25}%.

Fantasma.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] La duración de Paso fantasma aumenta en {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Fuerza cham\u00e1nica.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=100|100} PS.

Lluvia curadora.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] Los aliados dentro de Tótem curativo se curan un {scale=1|1}% de su salud máxima cada 1s.

Pararrayos.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Te curas {scale=30|30} PS por cada enemigo que alcances con Pulso de choque.

Rayo de arco.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] El alcance de cadenas de Pulso de choque aumenta un {scale=8|8}%.

Rescate tot\u00e9mico.card_desc: [Armadura] Consigues un escudo con {scale=200|200} PS durante 4s cuando tu salud baja al 30% o menos.

T\u00f3tem monolito.card_desc: [Tótem curativo] La salud de Tótem curativo aumenta en {scale=250|250} PS.

Ventarr\u00f3n.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Reduce la recarga de Tótem curativo en {scale=1|1}s al activar Paso fantasma.

Viajero astral.card_desc: [Paso fantasma] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta mientras usas Paso fantasma un {scale=25|25}%.

Vor\u00e1gine.card_desc: [Pulso de choque] Los disparos de tu arma reducen la recarga de Pulso de choque en 0,5s y la habilidad encadena 4 veces más.

Alcance.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta em {scale=25|25}% o raio de alcance do Totem Curativo.

Assombra\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Reduz o intervalo do Passo Fantasma em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Chuva Curativa.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aliados na área do Totem Curativo são curados em {scale=1|1}% de suas vidas máximas a cada 1s.

Corrente El\u00e9trica.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Os disparos do seu Cajado reduzem o intervalo do Pulso Elétrico em 0,5s e o Pulso Elétrico ricocheteia mais 4 vezes.

Dom\u00ednio do Esp\u00edrito.card_desc: [Arma] Atingir aliados com seu Cajado de raios os cura em 900 de vida por segundo.

Eletrificado.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=6|6}% por 3s após atingir um inimigo com o Pulso Elétrico.

Eletrost\u00e1tica.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=12|12}% a velocidade de regeneração da sua arma.

Fa\u00edsca.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta a duração do Totem Curativo em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fantasma.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Aumenta a duração do Passo Fantasma em {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Fulminado.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Gera {scale=6|6}% de munição para cada inimigo único atingido pelo Pulso Elétrico.

Para-raios.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Você se cura em {scale=30|30} ao atingir um inimigo com o Pulso Elétrico.

Rel\u00e2mpago em Arco.card_desc: [Pulso Elétrico] Aumenta a área de ricochete do Pulso Elétrico em {scale=8|8}%.

Resgate Tot\u00eamico.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha um escudo de {scale=200|200} de vida por 4s ao chegar a 30% ou menos da sua vida.

Senhor do Trov\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a sua munição máxima.

Totem Mon\u00f3lito.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta a vida do Totem Curativo em {scale=250|250}.

Ventania.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Reduz em {scale=1|1}s o intervalo do Totem Curativo ao ativar o Passo Fantasma.

Viajante astral.card_desc: [Passo Fantasma] Aumenta em {scale=25|25}% sua velocidade de movimento durante Passo Fantasma.

Vigia Tot\u00eamico.card_desc: [Totem Curativo] Aumenta em 30% a cura do Totem Curativo e os aliados curados por ele recebem imunidade a controle coletivo por 2s.

\u0410\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] При использовании Призрачной походки ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=25|25}%.

\u0412\u0438\u0445\u0440\u044c.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Выстрелы из оружия сокращают перезарядку Электроимпульса на 0,5 с. Он отскакивает еще 4 раза.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043e\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] За каждого пораженного Электроимпульсом врага вы исцеляетесь на {scale=30|30} ед.

\u0418\u0441\u0446\u0435\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Союзники в области действия Исцеляющего тотема исцеляются на {scale=1|1}% от их максимального здоровья каждую секунду.

\u041a\u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Попадание по врагу Электроимпульсом повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=6|6}% на 3 с.

\u041c\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Исцеляющий тотем становится прочнее на {scale=250|250} ед.

\u041c\u043e\u0449\u044c \u0448\u0430\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041e\u0445\u0432\u0430\u0442.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Радиус действия Исцеляющего тотема увеличивается на {scale=25|25}%.

\u0422\u0435\u0440\u0440\u0438\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадания Посохом молний по союзникам исцеляют их на 900 ед. в секунду.

\u0422\u043e\u0442\u0435\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 30% и ниже вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=200|200} ед. на 4 с.
[Исцеляющий тотем] Количество здоровья, восстанавливаемого Исцеляющим тотемом, повышается на 30%, а исцеленные им союзники получают иммунитет к эффектам контроля на 2 с.

\u0422\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043a.card_desc: [Исцеляющий тотем] Длительность действия Исцеляющего тотема увеличивается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0423\u0434\u0430\u0440 \u0433\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Электроимпульс] Вы генерируете {scale=6|6}% своего боезапаса за каждого нового врага, пораженного Электроимпульсом.

\u0424\u0430\u043d\u0442\u043e\u043c.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Длительность Призрачной походки увеличивается на {scale=0.3|0.3} с.

\u0428\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043c.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Активация Призрачной походки сокращает перезарядку Исцеляющего тотема на {scale=1|1} с.

\u042f\u0432\u043b\u0435\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Призрачная походка] Перезарядка Призрачной походки сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

Gwiezdny podr\u00f3\u017cnik.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu podczas używania Ścieżki duchów o {scale=25|25}%.

Kamienny totem.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Zwiększa odporność Totemu leczniczego o {scale=250|250} pkt.

Kana\u0142.card_desc: [Porażenie] Trafienie wroga Porażeniem zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=6|6}% na 3 s.

Kr\u00f3lestwo duch\u00f3w.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie sojuszników Kosturem błyskawic przywraca im 900 PZ co 1 s.

Leczniczy deszcz.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Sojusznicy wewnątrz Totemu odzyskują {scale=1|1}% maks. zdrowia co 1 s.

Moc szamana.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa poziom maks. zdrowia o {scale=100|100} PZ.

Nawiedzenie.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Skraca czas odnowienia Ścieżki duchów o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Piorunochron.card_desc: [Porażenie] Trafienie wroga Porażeniem przywraca ci {scale=30|30} PZ.

Totemiczny ratunek.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia tarczę o {scale=200|200} pkt. odporności na 4 s po tym, jak twoje zdrowie spadnie do poziomu 30% lub niżej.

Trafienie gromu.card_desc: [Porażenie] Wytwarza {scale=6|6}% amunicji za każde trafienie Porażeniem kolejnego wroga.

Trzask.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Wydłuża czas trwania totemu leczniczego o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Wiatr.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Skraca czas odnowienia Totemu leczniczego o {scale=1|1} s po aktywacji Ścieżki duchów.

Widmo.card_desc: [Ścieżka duchów] Wydłuża czas trwania Ścieżki duchów o {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Wir.card_desc: [Porażenie] Strzały z broni skracają czas odnowienia Porażenia o 0,5 s, a Porażenie odbija się dodatkowe 4 razy.

Zasi\u0119g.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Zwiększa promień Totemu leczniczego o {scale=25|25}%.

Zasi\u0119g totemu.card_desc: [Totem leczniczy] Zwiększa leczenie od Totemu leczniczego o 30%, a sojusznicy uleczeni przez Totem Leczniczy zyskują odporność na Kontrolę tłumu na 2 s.

Astral Seyahat.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü kullanırken Hareket Hızını %{scale=25|25} artır.

Bora.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü etkinleştirdikten sonra İyileştirici Totem'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Girdap.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Silah atışların, Şok Darbesi'nin bekleme süresini 0,5 sn azaltır ve Şok Darbesi 4 defa daha zincirlenir.

G\u00f6zc\u00fc Totem.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totem'in İyileştirmesini %30 ve Totem ile İyileştirilen müttefiklerin Kitle Kontrol Dokunulmazlığını 2sn artır.

\u0130letken.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} artır.

Musallat.card_desc: [Hayalet Yürüyüşü] Hayalet Yürüyüşü'nün Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Paratoner.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=30|30} Can iyileş.

Ruhun Topraklar\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Yıldırım Asası ile vurulan müttefikler saniyede 900 Can İyileşirler.

Seken Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi'nin Zincir menzilini %{scale=8|8} artır.

\u015eifal\u0131 Ya\u011fmur.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totem'inin içerisindeki müttefikler her 1 saniyede maksimum Canlarının %{scale=1|1} kadarı İyileşir.

Totem Kurtar\u0131\u015f\u0131.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %30 ya da altına düşerse 4sn boyunca {scale=200|200} Canlık bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Uzan.card_desc: [İyileştirici Totem] İyileştirici Totem'in etki alanını %{scale=25|25} artır.

Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m \u00c7arpmas\u01.card_desc: [Şok Darbesi] Şok Darbesi ile her farklı düşmana yapılan vuruş başına Cephanenin %{scale=6|6} kadarı dolar.
